text_block_list.text: ＜Sirius＞ was once again aiming for the Spring Trophyー

As if to prove those words weren't a lie, 
Special Week continued to put in the effort.

For the sake of supporting her, there was only 
one thing on my mind, the [Spring Tenno Sho].

However, for her, a member of the team that wanted 
to make the race special, the feeling of "Wanting 
to Take the Trophy" grew stronger.
And then――

Bathed in sunlight, the Kyoto race course！ 
Aiming for the glory of the trophy, 12 Uma Musume have gathered！
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
As expected, the center of attention 
is last year's champion, Mejiro Bright！
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
And then we have the challengers from the "Golden 
Generation", the Kikka Sho Uma Musume Seiun Sky, 
and the Derby Uma Musume Special Week!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
In this three-way battle, what result awaits us, 
as the crowded stands gaze on with bated breath！？
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan, do your best out there! Just like with McQueen, we're 
expecting the ultimate [Spring Tenno Sho]!
text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket

text_block_list.text:
I'm thinkin' of winnin' this race someday too！ 
So get out there and help raise this emotion to the max！
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Yeah！ I'll live up to those expectations！
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: (Diiiing……♪)
Hm？ Was that Spe's phone？
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Ah！ It's a message from Suzuka-san！
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Let's see…… 『I'll be cheering you on. Do your best, Spe-chin』……。 
……Spe-chin?
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
It's the middle of the night over there, 
she's probably half-asleep and hit the wrong key……。
text_block_list.name: Narita Brian

text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, half asleep but still frantically cheering you on, 
she must have really wanted to make sure that you knew.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: We'll cheer you on lots too……！
text_block_list.name: Rice Shower

text_block_list.text: Do your best, Special Week-san！
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut

text_block_list.text: We believe you'll be the one to cross the goal first！
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs

text_block_list.text:
Your form during training was the best so far, 
all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
the results will definitely follow.
text_block_list.name: <username>
choice_data_list: Show us you can take that trophy！
Show us you can take that trophy！

text_block_list.text:
Your form during training was the best so far, 
all that's left is to have confidence in yourself, 
the results will definitely follow.
text_block_list.name: <username>
choice_data_list: Show us you can take that trophy！
Show us you can take that trophy！

text_block_list.text:
Yeah! My Moms' dream, my own dream, and with everyone's feelings 
giving me strength, I'll definitely win!
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text:
Yo, Spe-chan. We haven't been in the same race 
together since the 『Kikka Sho』, huh?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Sei-chan
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: I won that time but, let's just see who'll win this time around。
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: ……once again, the look on your face seems a little different。
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Yeah, I've got a lot of expectations I need to live up to！
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: ……that's the same for me.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
No matter who my opponent is, I need only accomplish 
what I must…… that is how I feel。
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
However, before that, to Seiun Sky-sama…… and even before that to 
Special Week-sama, I fell behind.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
Once again, to both of you from the "Golden Generation" 
with my deep respect, I shall be the one to stand 
at the top after this race……！
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text:
I guess can't back down after all that, huh～? 
All that's left is to settle this with the race.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Yeah, with all our strength……！
text_block_list.name: Special Week

text_block_list.text: That's just how I'd like it……！
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright

text_block_list.text: Well then, let's get going.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Now, for these 12 excellent contestants, 
the curtain rises on this long 3200m battle！
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Will it be last year's champion who crosses the 
goal first?! Or will it be one from the "Golden 
Generation" that split the Classic crown?!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
The Uma Musume have settled in their gates. 
The 『Spring Tenno Sho』 now ―― Begins！
text_block_list.name: Commentator
